Class BehaviourListFragment

java.lang.Object

      android.support.v4.app.ListFragment
          fr.umlv.escapeirandroid.editor.BehaviourListFragment
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener
public class BehaviourListFragment
extends android.support.v4.app.ListFragment

The Class BehaviourListFragment displays a list of the know behaviours, giving the possibility to delete and rename them

Version:
$Revision: 1.0 $
Author:
THALAMOT Arnaud, VASSEUR Simon
